name: @vodyani/eslint-config
author: ChoGathK
description: üìè With a little preparation, the typescript eslint generic rules for vodyani may be readily integrated into projects.

scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && npm run version:tag && npm run version:commit
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && npm run version:tag && npm run version:commit
scripts.version:major: npm version major && npm run version:tag && npm run version:commit
scripts.version:commit: git add . && git commit -m "chore(publish): publish v$npm_package_version"
